name: Pictographic
title: pictographic.io
shortDescription: Pictographic offers a massive library of over 210,000 illustrations across 10 different styles, catering to designers and creatives who need diverse visual assets. Users can integrate these graphics directly into Figma, enhancing workflow efficiency. Additionally, if a desired image is not available, Pictographic's generate function allows users to create new illustrations in the existing styles. This tool is ideal for graphic designers looking to streamline their design process and maintain consistency across projects.
cons: May require internet connection for full functionality

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adobe Stock
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Wide range of stock images and graphics
